media:group.media:title: The Most Competitive Golf Game?
media:group.media:description:
The World's Absolute Best Golf Game - Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour

Today, we’re talking about a game with all the features we love to see featured on this channel. 

This is a game that demands quick reactions, complicated strategies that reward intense study, and skill expression that rewards those select few who commit to fully mastering the game. But despite all these factors, its esports potential has gone largely unnoticed by the community. 

In today's video, we’re changing things up and talking about an old-school game in a rife genre with solid esports contenders that is still waiting to fully realize its potential.

Grab your clubs, make sure to account for the wind and we’ll see you on the green. This is Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour - an esport in the waiting?
